short_summary: The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) has a requirement to maintain and repair Gas Chromatography and Liquid Chromatography instruments in the lab.
description: The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) has a requirement to maintain and repair Gas Chromatography and Laboratory Equipment and Supplies - Repair instruments in the lab. The work will involve as and when required repairs, as well as, once a year preventive maintenance performed for each instrument.
tags: Gas Chromatography and Laboratory Equipement and Suppiles
full_summary:
=====================================

**Maintenance and Repair of Chromatography Instruments**

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01021343
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: PR65823

**Publication Date**: January 13, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Goods and Services Identified**: The Canada Border Services Agency requires a contractor to maintain and repair Gas Chromatography and Liquid Chromatography instruments in the laboratory. The scope of work includes:

* On-demand repairs as required
* Annual preventive maintenance for each instrument

**Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
**Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity**: Canada Border Services Agency
**Contact Information**:

* Name: Olivier Décarie
* Email: CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
* Address: 355 North River Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0L8, Canada

**Attachments**:

* PR65823_Acan.pdf
* PR65823_Acan_Amd01.pdf
* PR65823_Pac.pdf
* PR65823_Pac_Amd01.pdf

**Note**: The tender closing date and time are as follows:

January 31, 2023, 14:00:00
Note: I've condensed the text to fit within 400 words and only included relevant information. I've used proper English grammar and formatting to make the entry more professional. I've also added headings to make it easier to read and understand. I hope this meets your requirements. Let me know if you need any further assistance.  I used markdown formatting as per your request. 

Reply if you want me to make any changes.  I look forward to your
